医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
正念和认知行为疗法为慢性腰痛提供了持久的缓解研究人员比较成人与阿片类药物治疗的慢性下背痛的长期有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/mindfulness-and-cognitive-behavioral-thavioral-therapies offer-lasting-lasting-for-chronic-chronic-low-low-back-back-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/mindfulness-and-cognitive-behavioral-thavioral-therapies offer-lasting-lasting-for-chronic-chronic-low-low-back-back-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7555 ead9-bb9-40f6-8685-a38d38d3bd43182 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 06:19:00 -0400 Mindfulness and cognitive behavioral therapies offer lasting relief for chronic low back pain
新的基于喹啉的抗病毒对SARS-COV-2表现出强烈的希望研究人员开发了基于喹啉的药物，具有针对SARS-COV-2类木瓜样蛋白酶（PLPRO）的抑制活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-quinoline基于-santiviral-shows-strong-promise-promise-promise-promise-against-sars-cov-2.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-quinoline基于-santiviral-shows-strong-promise-promise-promise-against-sars-cov-2.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7938Da8e-6BE1-44DD-9171-5654E53EEE97 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 06:00:00 -0400 New quinoline-based antiviral shows strong promise against SARS-CoV-2
AI驱动的个性化营养表明有望改善肠道健康研究人员研究了基于AI的个性化营养计划对健康个体肠道微生物组的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/ai-driven-personalized-nutrition-nutrition-shows-promise-in-impromise-in-improving-gut-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/ai-driven-personalized-nutrition-nutrition-shows-promise-in-impromise-in-improving-gut-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26C21860-C8E0-4F4D-A6A6-0F5C901C999BD Thu, 10 Apr 2025 05:41:00 -0400 AI-driven personalized nutrition shows promise in improving gut health
无油温度控制的平行顶部搅拌系统的扩展，非常适合筛选Asynt宣布，新型平行的高架搅拌平台Drysyn Vortex的关键更改，从而可以灵活地使用常见的实验室玻璃器皿，以在微小的足迹中最多三个烧瓶/烧杯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/expansion-of-compact-oil-free-free-temperature-temperature-controlled-parallel-overhead-stirring-system-system-thate28099s- ideal-ideal-deal-ideal-for-for-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/expansion-of-compact-compact-oil-free-temperature-temperature-controlled-parallel-overhead-stirring-systemsystem-thate28099s-iideal-ideal-ideal-for-for-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9649908-3703-4c05-9b83-9b83-00a0a0bb537424 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 05:16:00 -0400 Expansion of compact oil-free temperature controlled parallel overhead stirring system that’s ideal for screening
由单个遗传“命中”驱动的血液癌的快速生长当慢性髓样白血病（一种影响血液和骨髓）的癌症出现时，一项新的研究揭示了一项新的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/rapid-growth-ofblood-cancer-cancer-cancer-driven-by-a-single-genetle-genetic-e28098hite28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/rapid-growth-growth-of-blood-cancer-cancer-driven-by-a-single-genetic-genetic-e28098hite280999.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bfb753a-A830-4B0A-A063-9DA1492F8AC4 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 03:48:00 -0400 Rapid growth of blood cancer driven by a single genetic ‘HIT’
研究表明了美国早期投资于19 Covid-19疫苗的智慧五年前，随着新的大流行在他们周围涌动，志愿者在针对Covid-19的疫苗的第一次临床试验中卷起了袖子。一年后，有6600万美国成年人至少获得了一剂Covid-19-19疫苗，无需支付任何费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/study-shows-wisdom-of-early-us-us-investment-in-covid-19-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/study-shows-wisdom-of-early-us-us-investment-in-covid-19-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2630087a-6142-4B89-BDBF-8C7D8A38383AFC Thu, 10 Apr 2025 01:27:20 -0400 Study shows wisdom of early US investment in COVID-19 vaccines
研究描述了血液疾病及其对埃博拉患者预后的影响宣布了《人畜共患杂志》的新文章出版物。血液学疾病经常发生在埃博拉病毒疾病（EVD）的患者中，其特征是血细胞中的一种或多种异常，包括止血，记录得很少。这项研究描述了埃博拉病人的血液学异常，以及对被EVD入院的患者结果的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/research-descripes-blood-disorders-and-and-yir-impact-on-ebola-ebola-patient-comes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/research-descripes-blood-disorders-and-and-their-their-impact-on-ebola-patient-comes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=239d661b-5cd9-4078-8f1d-d8c2aa3508d4 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 01:07:58 -0400 Research describes blood disorders and their impact on Ebola patient outcomes
研究克服了脂质纳米颗粒的化学疗法限制宣布了《生物集成杂志》的新文章出版物。基于脂质的纳米颗粒（LBNP）已成为癌症治疗中的一种变革性方法，提供了创新的药物输送溶液，从而增强了治疗功效，同时最大程度地减少了不良影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/lbnps-revolutionizing-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/lbnps-revolutionizing-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ae4cce0-ae3f-4711-9432-0E387F5EE41A Thu, 10 Apr 2025 00:55:00 -0400 Study overcomes chemotherapy limitations with lipid nanoparticles
美国的研究揭示了雇主尽管有成本担忧，但愿意覆盖抗肥胖药物一项旨在了解肥胖管理的看法以及美国雇主和雇员使用抗肥胖医学的一项新研究已发表在同行评审的期刊《人口健康管理》中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/a-dual-pective-pective-empletive-employer-and-employee-employee-views-on-obesity-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/a-dual-ppective-pective-empletive-employer-and-employee-employee-views-on-obesity-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=684b4fcc-4b82-4553-4553-87ab-ecbb84ff79d6 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 00:38:00 -0400 US study reveals employer willingness to cover anti-obesity meds despite cost concerns
AI驱动的鼠标视觉皮层的数字双胞胎就像飞行员可能在飞行模拟器中练习操纵一样，科学家可能很快就可以对小鼠大脑进行现实模拟进行实验。在一项新的研究中，斯坦福大学的医学研究人员和合作者使用人工智能模型来构建处理视觉信息的小鼠大脑部分的“数字双胞胎”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/ai-powered-digital-twin-twin-of-mouse-mouse-visual-cortex.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/ai-powered-digital-twin-twin-twin-of-mouse-visual-cortex.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1444d0ab-001f-4604-AD49-CD9A4B0FE7B4 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 00:21:48 -0400 AI-powered digital twin of mouse visual cortex
